id: CIA concludes Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman ordered Khashoggi killing
paragraph: A new CIA assessment found that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman ordered the killing of journalist Jamal Khashoggi, NBC News confirmed. President Trump on Saturday morning said he had yet to be briefed on the CIA’s findings and called Saudi Arabia “a great ally.”Nov. 17, 2018© 2018 NBC UNIVERSAL
